name: LOLLILOOP
description:
Welcome to Lolliloop, the latest in digital fun and entertainment!

In this little game, you are presented with a grid of wires. To beat a level, you have to connect one side of the little sleepy guy to the other by rotating these wires.
In some levels you will find different obstacles and hazards, make sure your cursor doesn't touch them!

CONTROLS
  • MOVE -> ARROWS
  • ROTATE -> Z
CREDITS
